body_html:
I am very sorry that I did not express the basic configuration of the computer clearly.
I downloaded others repository from github, but I made a mistake on my computer. And this statement just called argmax() function.

-----------------This is the error statement -----------------------
offset = tf.argmax(yi, axis=3, output_type=tf.int32)
TypeError: argmax() got an unexpected keyword argument 'output_type'
-----------------This is the error statement -----------------------

And my platform: Ubuntu16.04LST, CUDA8.0, cudnn5.1, python3.6, tensorflow1.2(I installed Tensor Flow on the official website and downloaded the .whl file)
GPU: TITAN X(Pascal)
Mem: 64GB
Thank you for your patient answer.

body:
I am very sorry that I did not express the basic configuration of the computer clearly.
I downloaded others repository from github, but I made a mistake on my computer. And this statement just called argmax() function.

-----------------This is the error statement -----------------------
offset = tf.argmax(yi, axis=3, output_type=tf.int32)
TypeError: argmax() got an unexpected keyword argument 'output_type'
-----------------This is the error statement -----------------------

And my platform: Ubuntu16.04LST, CUDA8.0, cudnn5.1, python3.6, tensorflow1.2(I installed Tensor Flow on the official website and downloaded the .whl file)
GPU: TITAN X(Pascal)
Mem: 64GB
Thank you for your patient answer.
